kitronik_motor_driver: Blocks for driving the Kitronik Motor Driver Board
kitronik_motor_driver.motorOff: Turns off the motor specified by eMotors
kitronik_motor_driver.motorOn:
Turns on motor specified by eMotors in the direction specified
by eDirection, at the requested speed 
* @param motor which motor to turn on
kitronik_motor_driver.motorOn|param|spee: how fast to spin the motor
